title: Enhancing Nursing Practice Competencies: Designing Mathematical Problem-Solving Strategies for Adult Working Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: High School-Level Mathematics Concept Comprehension and Basic Arithmetic Proficiency
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Applying problem-solving models (understanding-analyzing-planning-executing-reviewing) to systematically analyze complex math problems in workplace contexts
Selecting appropriate mathematical approaches (algorithmic, heuristic, modeling) based on situational demands to formulate problem-solving strategies
Providing feedback to identify and correct errors occurring during collaborative problem-solving processes with peers
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
